meanings.definition: The dried resinous exudate of the flowering tops of female hemp plants, smoked or chewed as a narcotic or an intoxicant.
meanings.sent1: The hashishes from the hemp plants were used for their intoxicating properties.
meanings.sent2: People enjoy smoking hashishes for relaxation.
meanings.sent3: The party became lively after someone brought out the hashishes.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter floated in the air like the sweet scent of hashishes.
meanings.sent5: The hashishes glowed in the dim light, tempting those around.

meanings.definition: A preparation of the resinous exudate of the flowering tops of female hemp plants, smoked or chewed for its intoxicating effect.
meanings.sent1: The hashishes preparation was potent and highly sought after.
meanings.sent2: He rolled a joint with hashishes for a stronger high.
meanings.sent3: The chef accidentally added hashishes to the dessert, creating a unique flavor.
meanings.sent4: The music seemed to dance along with the swirling smoke of hashishes.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of hashishes filled the room, creating a dreamy atmosphere.
